content:
Prova a fare queste operazioni di manutenzione:

  1. Fare un backup integrale del profilo -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/profili-thunderbird#w_effettuare-una-copia-di-sicurezza-del-profilo
  2. Compattare le cartelle -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/compattazione-cartelle
  3. Riavviare Thunderbird
  4. Se il problema non è risolto, ricostruire l'indice globale -> https://support.mozilla.org/it/kb/ricostruzione-indice-globale
  5. Riavviare Thunderbird
  6. Se il problema non si è ancora risolto: click destro sulla cartella che contiene la mail illeggibile -> Proprietà -> [Ripara la cartella]

content:
Informazioni utili da fornire nelle richieste al forum:

  1. Versione di Thunderbird
  2. Versione del sistema operativo
  3. Provider delle caselle email (Gmail, Libero, Hotmail, etc.)
  4. Tipologia di account (POP3, IMAP)
  5. Estensioni installate
  6. Messaggi di errore che vengono visualizzati durante l'utilizzo di Thunderbird
  7. Software di sicurezza eventualmente presenti (Antivirus e simili)

content:
If you are referring to the Primary Password, we do not have it, nor can it be retrieved from Thunderbird. To recover the accounts, do this: 

Choose Tools -> Developer Tools > Error Console, paste the expression:    openDialog("chrome://pippki/content/resetpassword.xhtml")     and press the Evaluate button. That will open a dialog asking you if you want to reset your password. If Evaluate is not seen, press enter key. When prompted, press the Reset button.

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/protect-your-thunderbird-passwords-primary-password#w_resetting-your-primary-password-if-you-have-forgotten-it

NOTE: Doing this removes passwords from accounts, so they will need to be reentered.
creator: davidsk

content: Beste Hans, Dank voor uw bericht welke we zullen delen met de ontwikkelaars. E-mail lijkt iets heel eenvoudigs, maar is aan de achterkant zeer complex en heeft tal van mogelijkheden die voor iedereen beschikbaar worden gesteld. Begrijpelijk dat niet iedereen op alle functies en mogelijkheden zit te wachten waardoor de complexiteit toeneemt. Thunderbird heeft al mogelijkheden om het uiterlijk naar eigen smaak aan te passen, zoals uitgelegd in dit artikel: https://support.mozilla.org/nl/kb/werkbalken-aanpassen en dit artikel: https://support.mozilla.org/nl/kb/de-vormgeving-van-thunderbird-wijzigen. Kijk maar eens of dit mogelijkheden biedt om Thunderbird er minder complex uit te laten zien.

content: This response is only for your local folders question: - install the addon, importexporttools - highlight "Local Folders' - rightclick and select the importexport option to import mbox - locate and select one of the message files (NOT the msf file) and click OK - repeat above steps for each desired message folder retrieval.

creator: harie

content: This hints of a problem in saving file to hard drive. Thunderbird saves settings in prefs.js, a file in the profile. It does that when closing and, there is an error in saving, when thunderbird restarts, it uses the prior setup. You might check in profile to see if that file is read-only. Problems can also happen if a VPN or antivirus is interfering with thunderbird. You might see multiple copies of prefs. js, such as prefs-1.js, prefs-2.js, etc. In that case, the one with highest number 'may' be the one with latest settings. If the update date reflects that, you could delete all prefs.js files except the highest one, and rename it to prefs.js. These are simple text files, so you could also browse them for content.
creator: davidsk
